PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
:SET &CONN_ENDPOINT_URL#=&UC4RB_TIO_BASE_URL# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_RA_JOB :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_CONNECTION_AUTH_NONE
!preparing X-APIKeys for authentication :SET &UC4RB_KEYS#="" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_X-APIKEYS
!Escaping Inputs and making request json
!adding name to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_SCN_NAME#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_SCAN_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_SCAN_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_SCN_NAME#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_SCN_NAME#=STR_CAT('"name":"',&UC4RB_TIO_SCN_NAME#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_SCN_NAME#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_SCN_NAME#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding description to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_DES#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_DESC# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_DESC# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_DES#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_DES#=STR_CAT('"description":"',&UC4RB_TIO_DES#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_DES#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_DES#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding folder_id to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_FOLDR_ID#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_FOLDER_ID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_FOLDER_ID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_FOLDR_ID#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_FOLDR_ID#=STR_CAT('"folder_id":',&UC4RB_TIO_FOLDR_ID#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_FOLDR_ID#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_FOLDR_ID#,',') :ENDIF
!adding scanner_id to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_SCR_ID#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_SCNR_ID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_SCNR_ID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_SCR_ID#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_SCR_ID#=STR_CAT('"scanner_id":',&UC4RB_TIO_SCR_ID#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_SCR_ID#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_SCR_ID#,',') :ENDIF
!Setting true/false for Enabled input :SET &UC4RB_ENABLED# = '"enabled":false' :IF &UC4RB_TIO_ENABLED# <> "No" : SET &UC4RB_ENABLED# = '"enabled":true' :ENDIF
!adding launch to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_LNCH#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_LAUNCH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_LAUNCH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_LNCH#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_LNCH#=STR_CAT('"launch":"',&UC4RB_TIO_LNCH#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_LNCH#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_LNCH#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding starttime to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TM#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TIME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TIME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TM#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TM#=STR_CAT('"starttime":"',&UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TM#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TM#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TM#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding rules to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_RULS#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_RULES# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_RULES# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_RULS#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_RULS#=STR_CAT('"rrules":"',&UC4RB_TIO_RULS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_RULS#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_RULS#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding timezone to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_TM_ZON#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_TIM_ZON# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_TIM_ZON# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TM_ZON#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TM_ZON#=STR_CAT('"timezone":"',&UC4RB_TIO_TM_ZON#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TM_ZON#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_TM_ZON#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding target_groups to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_TRG_GRPS#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_TRGT_GRPS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TRG_GRPS#=STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_TIO_TRGT_GRPS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TRG_GRPS#=STR_CAT('"asset_lists":[',&UC4RB_TIO_TRG_GRPS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TRG_GRPS#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_TRG_GRPS#,'],') :ENDIF
!adding agent_group_id to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_AGT_GRPS#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_AGNT_GRPS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_TIO_AGT_GRPS#=STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_TIO_AGNT_GRPS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_AGT_GRPS#=STR_CAT(',"agent_group_id":[',&UC4RB_TIO_AGT_GRPS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_AGT_GRPS#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_AGT_GRPS#,']') :ENDIF
!adding text_targets to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_TRGTS#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_TARGETS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_TARGETS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TRGTS#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TRGTS#=STR_CAT('"text_targets":"',&UC4RB_TIO_TRGTS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_TRGTS#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_TRGTS#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding file_targets to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TGTS#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TRGTS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TRGTS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TGTS#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TGTS#=STR_CAT('"file_targets":"',&UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TGTS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TGTS#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TGTS#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding emails to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_EMLS#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_EMAILS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#=&UC4RB_TIO_EMAILS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TIO_EMLS#=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_TIO_EMLS#=STR_CAT('"emails":"',&UC4RB_TIO_EMLS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_EMLS#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_EMLS#,'",') :ENDIF
!adding acls to json :SET &UC4RB_TIO_ACL#="" :IF &UC4RB_TIO_ACLS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_TIO_ACL#=STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_TIO_ACLS#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_ACL#=STR_CAT('"acls":[',&UC4RB_TIO_ACL#) : SET &UC4RB_TIO_ACL#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TIO_ACL#,'],') :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_TIO_REQ_JSON#='{ "settings" : {&UC4RB_TIO_SCN_NAME# &UC4RB_TIO_DES# &UC4RB_TIO_FOLDR_ID# &UC4RB_TIO_SCR_ID# &UC4RB_TIO_LNCH# &UC4RB_TIO_STRT_TM# &UC4RB_TIO_RULS# &UC4RB_TIO_TM_ZON# &UC4RB_TIO_TRGTS# &UC4RB_TIO_FILE_TGTS# &UC4RB_TIO_EMLS# &UC4RB_TIO_ACL# &UC4RB_TIO_TRG_GRPS# &UC4RB_ENABLED# }&UC4RB_TIO_AGT_GRPS#}'
